Articles.Content:
A couple of issues that i think are known but unsure if actually reported or not..

1.  You cannot create or edit maneuver nodes when paused.  This forces people to work really fast to get nodes created during initial launch and circularization in LKO, which will lead to frustration and mistakes.  Especially for new players, who aren't as quick on the draw in what to do as veterans of the series.

2.  Orbit lines/flight paths don't show up until/unless you are in a body's SOI.  You simply cannot see where you are headed, which makes fiddling with maneuvers to get that perfect trajectory can't happen.

3.  Course after burn does not always match plotted course.  I have video on this.  Multiple videos, in fact.  Specifically in the following post:

In both videos I plot a course, hold the node using SAS, and yet after the burn the new course is vastly different from what was plotted.  It is possible I did something wrong, but in the event u didn't, I'm reporting this.

I know we should be adding issues to existing threads.  Unfortunately, and as I mentioned to @Dman979 in another thread, it is getting harder and harder to know what has or has not been reported due to the sheer number of threads.  I know you guys are working to merge threads, but the titles are horrible ans search isn't returning the best results.  So I apologize for opening another thread you have to merge.

Would it be possible to get a stickied thread with links to threads for specific issues?  That way we can easily find what has been reported, and then add to the appropriate threads?
